00012 Shape::Shape ()
00013     :   width_(0),
00014         height_(0),
00015         pixels_(std::vector<Pixel>(0)),
00016         size_(0),
00017         leftPixel_(Pixel(0,0)),
00018         rightPixel_(Pixel(0,0)),
00019         topPixel_(Pixel(0,0)),
00020         bottomPixel_(Pixel(0,0))

00030 void Shape::addPixel (const Pixel &pixel)
00031 {
00032     // Add the pixel and update the size_ member
00033     pixels_.push_back( pixel );
00034     size_ = pixels_.size();
00035     
00036     
00037     // Initialize the extreme pixels the first time we invoke this method
00038     if ( size_ == 1 )
00039     {
00040         topPixel_       = pixels_.at(0);
00041         bottomPixel_    = pixels_.at(0);
00042         leftPixel_      = pixels_.at(0);
00043         rightPixel_     = pixels_.at(0);
00044     }
00045     else    // Update the extreme pixel
00046     {
00047         if ( pixel.first < topPixel_.first )
00048             topPixel_ = pixels_.back();
00049         
00050         if ( pixel.first > bottomPixel_.first )
00051             bottomPixel_ = pixels_.back();
00052         
00053         if ( pixel.second > rightPixel_.second )
00054             rightPixel_ = pixels_.back();
00055         
00056         if ( pixel.second < leftPixel_.second )
00057             leftPixel_ = pixels_.back();
00058     }
00059     
00060     
00061     // Update the width and height of shape
00062     width_ = rightPixel_.second - leftPixel_.second + 1;
00063     height_ = bottomPixel_.first - topPixel_.first + 1;
00064 };
